Text: The Do-Over is a 2016 American action comedy film directed by Steven Brill, and written by Kevin Barnett and Chris Pappas.

Text: The Do-Over:  It stars Adam Sandler and David Spade.

Text: The Do-Over:  The film is the second in a four-film deal between Sandler and Netflix.
Triplets:<The Do-Over

Text: The Do-Over:  The film was released worldwide on Netflix on May 27, 2016.
